review: I bought the Chromecast a few days ago after the price lowered to 30 bucks.  I have to say, I could not be happier.  I have been a user of Apple TV and although I still prefer to use Apple TV because it is smoother and more compatible with the devices I stream from (iPhone, iPad) I still find Chromecast very useful.  Chromecast is now not only good for Youtube and Netflix streaming but also Hulu, VEVO, realplayer cloud and Pandora.  I find myself playing VEVO music videos or Pandora during parties from my iPhone because it is just so easy and fun to watch.  Also, with realplayer cloud (a great app) I am now able to stream videos I have taken straight to my TV.  If you are looking for a cheap alternative to Apple TV, Roku or Amazon Fire TV or just want to complement one of those systems I highly recommend purchasing Chromecast.  I am at a loss why anyone has rated it below 4 stars, it's cheap, very easy to use and setup and works well with a variety of devices and apps.  You will love it!
